resources.string: PEPPO is a app developed in the year 2021 by Nehana SM and Bhavana S. This app basically contains 3 Games, each game of various genre. Main intension of this app is to find different kinds of games inside one frame, so that when user gets bored of one game, he/she can play the other. To keep this more interesting we have locked the last game called "Angry Poacher" and this game can be unlocked only if the score of corona game is more than 150. Description of each game can be found below. Just go through the guidelines once before entering into the game. Thank you for using this application!!

Here player will be on FLIGHT and the angry birds try to attack him. In order to defend the player, you hav to shoot the birds. If in case the birds touch the flight or it approaches towards the player, he dies and GAMEOVER!!

Here there will be two players in which player1 will have a marker X and player2 will have marker O. Each one will be given alternative chance to place their marker in a 3x3 grid board. The one who achieves to place their marker in horizontal or vertical or diagonal order wins the game and will be declared as WINNER!! If both the players fail to do so then it will be TIE MATCH!!

Here the player has to defend himself from the virus and has to survive. He will have to gain the point by grabing food and diamond. By grabing food he will be awarded with 1 points and by grabing diamond his point increases by 3. If the player is attacked by virus, he will die and GAMEOVER!!
